Pre-Game Insights: India will be high on confidence after their T20I series win and will look to carry forward their momentum in the ODI series.
Sri Lanka will be low on morale after their poor performance in the T20I series and will need to regroup quickly.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the first of a three-match ODI series, with the next games to be played on August 4 and August 6.
The Indian team includes experienced players like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, KL Rahul, and Kuldeep Yadav, who will add stability to the lineup.
Others: The match will be played at R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo, with a 2:30 PM IST start time.
